item.title: Do you use vim/nvim as your main IDE?
item.description: Added blog section, so you can view all my posts! And recently I picked up learning nvim and I aim to use it as my main IDE (leaving from vscodium). Shortcuts are very powerful in vim, but pretty hard to remember or get used to it.

item.title: First Post and Follow!
item.description: Yes that's right, first follow and post? Wow that's wild! Thank you for the follow vanillamilkshake!
